General.Name: Keystone Microtech Corp
General.Description: Keystone Microtech Corporation operates in the semiconductor industry in Taiwan and internationally. It offers load boards and burn-in boards, probe cards/substrate, and modules. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Zhubei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.431, Zhuangjing N. Rd., Zhubei, Taiwan, 302
